alert.note: Alert for Chiriaco Summit; Chuckwalla Mountains; Chuckwalla Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 12:38AM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside County through 130 AM PDT... At 1238 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles east of Desert Center, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Desert Center. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 10 between mile markers 102 and 119. CA Route 177 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chiriaco Summit; Chuckwalla Mountains; Chuckwalla Valley
